name: Tomb Looter
description:
Welcome to my demo of Unreal Engine 5 game development. Tomb Looter is a 1st-person adventure game that places you in a dark and mysterious dungeon.  Your task is to find the hidden crypt and escape with the golden statue. Good luck!

[Controls]

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

P: Pause

Left Mouse Click: Grab Item
